description.name: description
description.value:
Index creation throws an exceptions in DevZone environment: ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Warning: Cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at /home/www/devzone.zend.com-2007-01-0 2-HappyNewYear-04/www/app/controllers/ReindexController.php:126) in /home/www/devzone.zend.com-2007-01-02-HappyNewYear-04/www/ap p/controllers/ReindexController.php on line 117

Unexpected Exception: Index compound file doesn't contain _38.fnm file.


#0 /home/www/devzone.zend.com-2007-01-02-Happ yNewYear-04/zendlib/library/Zend/Search/Lucene/Index/SegmentInfo.php(153): Zend_Search_Lucene_Index_SegmentInfo->openCompoundFile(' .fnm') #1 /home/www/devzone.zend.com-2007-01-02-HappyNewYear-04/zendlib/library/Zend/Search/Lucene/Index/Writer.php(410): Zend_Search_Luce ne_Index_SegmentInfo->__construct('_38', 10, Object(Zend_Search_Lucene_Storage_Directory_Filesystem)) #2 /home/www/devzone.zend.com-2007-01-02-HappyNewYear-04/zendlib/library/Zend/Search/Lucene/Index/Writer.php(430): Zend_Search_Luce ne_Index_Writer->_updateSegments() #3 /home/www/devzone.zend.com-2007-01-02-HappyNewYear-04/zendlib/library/Zend/Search/Lucene/Index/Writer.php(217): Zend_Search_Luce ne_Index_Writer->commit() #4 /home/www/devzone.zend.com-2007-01-02-HappyNewYear-04/zendlib/library/Zend/Search/Lucene.php(802): Zend_Search_Lucene_Index_Writ er->addDocument(Object(Zend_Search_Lucene_Document)) #5 /home/www/devzone.zend.com-2007-01-02-HappyNewYear-04/www/app/controllers/ReindexController.php(108): Zend_Search_Lucene->addDoc ument(Object(Zend_Search_Lucene_Document)) #6 /home/www/devzone.zend.com-2007-01-02-HappyNewYear-04/www/app/controllers/ReindexController.php(29): ReindexController::doReinde x() #7 /home/www/devzone.zend.com-2007-01-02-HappyNewYear-04/zendlib/library/Zend/Controller/Dispatcher.php(436): ReindexController->Al lAction() #8 /home/www/devzone.zend.com-2007-01-02-HappyNewYear-04/zendlib/library/Zend/Controller/Front.php(725): Zend_Controller_Dispatcher ->dispatch(Object(Zend_Controller_Request_Http), Object(Zend_Controller_Response_Http)) #9 /home/www/devzone.zend.com-2007-01-02-HappyNewYear-04/www/index.php(78): Zend_Controller_Front->dispatch() --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Unexpected Exception: Index compound file doesn't contain _33.fnm file.


#0 /home/www/staging.devzone.zend.com/zendlib/library/Zend/Search/Lucene/Index/SegmentInfo.php(153): Zend_Search_Lucene_Index_SegmentInfo->openCompoundFile('.fnm') #1 /home/www/staging.devzone.zend.com/zendlib/library/Zend/Search/Lucene/Index/Writer.php(410): Zend_Search_Lucene_Index_SegmentInfo->__construct('_33', 10, Object(Zend_Search_Lucene_Storage_Directory_Filesystem)) #2 /home/www/staging.devzone.zend.com/zendlib/library/Zend/Search/Lucene/Index/Writer.php(430): Zend_Search_Lucene_Index_Writer->_updateSegments() #3 /home/www/staging.devzone.zend.com/zendlib/library/Zend/Search/Lucene/Index/Writer.php(217): Zend_Search_Lucene_Index_Writer->commit() #4 /home/www/staging.devzone.zend.com/zendlib/library/Zend/Search/Lucene.php(802): Zend_Search_Lucene_Index_Writer->addDocument(Object(Zend_Search_Lucene_Document)) #5 /home/www/staging.devzone.zend.com/www/app/controllers/ReindexController.php(111): Zend_Search_Lucene->addDocument(Object(Zend_Search_Lucene_Document)) #6 /home/www/staging.devzone.zend.com/www/app/controllers/ReindexController.php(29): ReindexController::doReindex() #7 /home/www/staging.devzone.zend.com/zendlib/library/Zend/Controller/Dispatcher.php(436): ReindexController->AllAction() #8 /home/www/staging.devzone.zend.com/zendlib/library/Zend/Controller/Front.php(725): Zend_Controller_Dispatcher->dispatch(Object(Zend_Controller_Request_Http), Object(Zend_Controller_Response_Http)) #9 /home/www/staging.devzone.zend.com/www/index.php(77): Zend_Controller_Front->dispatch() --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ...

value.name: Zend_Search_Lucene
value.description: pure PHP robust, general purpose text search engine

value.body:
Fixed.

Problem was caused by concurrent index creation.

It may be a result of wget behavior, if it tries to get page within several connections/parts.
